verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to her that is <S%H4784>filthy<s%> and <S%H1351>polluted,<s%> to the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%>

She <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice;<s%> she <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4148>correction;<s%> she <S%H982>trusted<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> she drew not <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> her <S%H430>God.<s%>

Her <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> her are <S%H7580>roaring<s%> <S%H738>lions;<s%> her <S%H8199>judges<s%> are <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves;<s%> they gnaw not the <S%H1633>bones<s%> <S%H3808><s%> till the <S%H1242>morrow.<s%>

Her <S%H5030>prophets<s%> are <S%H6348>light<s%> and <S%H900>treacherous<s%> <S%H376>persons:<s%> her <S%H3548>priests<s%> have <S%H2490>polluted<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> they have done <S%H2554>violence<s%> to the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

The <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> thereof; he will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity:<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H1242><s%> doth he <S%H5414>bring<s%> his <S%H4941>judgment<s%> to <S%H216>light,<s%> he <S%H5737>faileth<s%> <S%H3808>not;<s%> but the <S%H5767>unjust<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1322>shame.<s%>

I have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> their <S%H6438>towers<s%> are <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> I made their streets <S%H2717>waste,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> that <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H1097><s%> passeth <S%H5674>by:<s%> their <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H6658>destroyed,<s%> so that there is <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> that there is <S%H4480>none<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> thou wilt <S%H3372>fear<s%> me, thou wilt <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction;<s%> so their <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off,<s%> <S%H3605>howsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6485>punished<s%> <S%H5921><s%> them: <S%H403>but<s%> they rose <S%H7925>early,<s%> and <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5949>doings.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2442>wait<s%> ye upon me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I rise <S%H6965>up<s%> to the <S%H5706>prey:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> my <S%H4941>determination<s%> is to <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> that I may <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H8210>pour<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them mine <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of my <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H227>then<s%> will I <S%H2015>turn<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1305>pure<s%> <S%H8193>language,<s%> that they may <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7926>consent.<s%>

From <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> my <S%H6282>suppliants,<s%> even the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H6327>dispersed,<s%> shall <S%H2986>bring<s%> mine <S%H4503>offering.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shalt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> thy <S%H5949>doings,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou hast <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee them that <S%H5947>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H1346>pride,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> be <S%H1361>haughty<s%> because of my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain.<s%>

I will also <S%H7604>leave<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee an <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H1800>poor<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they shall <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

The <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall a <S%H8649>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> and lie <S%H7257>down,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

Sing, <S%H7442><s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> <S%H7321>shout,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5937>rejoice<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath taken <S%H5493>away<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> he hath cast <S%H6437>out<s%> thine <S%H341>enemy:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee: thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> thou <S%H408>not:<s%> and to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> Let <S%H408>not<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7503>slack.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee is <S%H1368>mighty;<s%> he will <S%H3467>save,<s%> he will <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee with <S%H8057>joy;<s%> he will <S%H2790>rest<s%> in his <S%H160>love,<s%> he will <S%H1523>joy<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> thee with <S%H7440>singing.<s%>

I will <S%H622>gather<s%> them that are <S%H3013>sorrowful<s%> for the solemn <S%H4480>assembly,<s%> <S%H4150><s%> who <S%H1961>are<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> thee, to whom the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> it was a <S%H4864>burden.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H6213>undo<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thee: and I will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> her that <S%H6760>halteth,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> her that was driven <S%H5080>out;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>get<s%> them <S%H8416>praise<s%> and <S%H8034>fame<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> where they have been put to <S%H1322>shame.<s%>

At <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> you again, even in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that I <S%H6908>gather<s%> you: <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H8034>name<s%> and a <S%H8416>praise<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> when I turn <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H7622>captivity<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
